document_data.name: ''Sunwalker's Gift''
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sunwalker's Gift''' was an enchanted [[ring]] that could be used as a source of daylight.
document_data.Description: The ''Sunwalker's Gift'' was a simple silvery metal band with a single blood-red [[gem]] stone embedded into it.
document_data.Powers: The magic of the ''Sunwalker's Gift'' was held within the gem. The gem glowed with daylight, parting the darkness and shadows.
document_data.History: In [[1492 DR]], the ''Sunwalker's Gift'' was in possession of a [[orog]] member of the [[Society of Brilliance]], [[Blurg]], who was operating out of a peaceful [[myconid]] colony in the [[Underdark]], working to improve the living conditions of the subterranean realm.
